tool_contract.description: Alternate entry point for summarize_coverage using ConsensusAlignmentSet input.

schema_options.name: Number of regions
schema_options.description: Desired number of genome regions in the summary statistics (used for guidance, not strict). Defaults to 1000

schema_options.name: Region size
schema_options.description: If supplied, used a fixed genomic region size

schema_options.name: Maximum region size
schema_options.description: Upper limit for genomic region size (ignored if region_size is set explicitly)

schema_options.name: Force the number of regions
schema_options.description: If supplied, then try to use this number (max value = 40000) of regions per reference, otherwise the coverage summary report will optimize the number of regions in the case of many references.  Not compatible with a fixed region size.

output_types.title: Coverage Summary
output_types.description: Coverage summary for regions (bins) spanning the reference

tool_contract.name: Summarize Coverage (CCS)
